channel.title: Comments on: Call for action to tackle children’s loneliness

item.title: By: iosipratama
item.dc:creator: iosipratama
item.description: Relationships with family and friends are crucial to children’s happiness
item.content:encoded: Relationships with family and friends are crucial to children’s happiness

item.title: By: iosipratama
item.dc:creator: iosipratama
item.description:
In reply to <a href="./../index.html#comment-3">iosipratama</a>.
Children told us that they valued having someone to talk to
item.content:encoded:
In reply to iosipratama.

Children told us that they valued having someone to talk to

item.title: By: iosipratama
item.dc:creator: iosipratama
item.description: Loneliness can be something that passes and we see many children who use our services move through these difficult periods
item.content:encoded: Loneliness can be something that passes and we see many children who use our services move through these difficult periods
